{{Infobox USB Hub |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = mobil it |caption2 = Portable USB 2.0 4-Port Hub |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Ativa |model = 902-157 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/18/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ativa_902-157 |sernum = |series = |usb_ver = 2.0 |conn = Male A |size_class = mini, squid |vendor_id = 05e3 |device_id = 0608 |vendor_id2 = |device_id2 = |fcc_id = |controller_num = |chip1 = Genesys Logic;; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |pwr_optional = |pwr_volt_type = |pwr_vdc = |pwr_amp_dc = |pwr_vac = |pwr_ac_hz = |pwr_amp_ac = |pwr_poe_type = |pwr_poe = |pwr_poe_amp = |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |ports = 4 |tt = single |power_led = none |port_led = |flags = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |availability = |eoldate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 735854815509 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B008EPBBIS |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The label on the device states the device is a '''USB 2.0 Extending Hub''' and model MHC04. The '''D/C''' (whatever that is) is 116 (both on the device and on the box). This device would seem to be identical in appearance to the [[Belkin F4U046]]. One of the cords leading from the hub is a Male Mini-B cable.. which can be used alone or used as a standard Female-A port with the attached adapter. {{SCollapse | lsusb -v output â€¢ >> | 
Bus 009 Device 005: ID 05e3:0608 Genesys Logic, Inc. USB-2.0 4-Port HUB
